name: Shatered Spellcraft
description:
The malicious 'FINAL BOSS'  has destroyed all magic and reverted it into its raw components. now a brave hero must rise and fight his way through the FINAL BOSS's minions and defeat the FINAL BOSS to restore magic to the world.

*sadly the FINAL BOSS could not find a spot in his schedule for the game, so you are stuck with slimes and goblins. but don't worry it will be fine

in the game you must join 3 cards from your hand together in order to cast your spells, fighting enemies in turn-based combat. just don't die unless you wish to suffer the wrath of the SINGLE TORCH (I know very intimidating)

made by: null and penumbra.
